velocity_template.body:
Dear #if($recipientName != '') $recipientName, #else User(s), #end

Your asset order has been received by the Pantry team and you can expect to hear from us shortly.

Have a good day!

This email is an automated notification, which is unable to receive replies.
We are happy to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please contact us
directly 24/7 via customerservice@tenovos.io
velocity_template.subject: Order #: #if($title && $title != '') $title #end Pantry Order Confirmation

velocity_template.body:
Dear #if($recipientName != '') $recipientName, #else User(s), #end

A download order has been assigned to you. Please log into Pantry to address.

Have a good day!

This email is an automated notification, which is unable to receive replies.
We are happy to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please contact us
directly 24/7 via customerservice@tenovos.io
velocity_template.subject: Order #: #if($title && $title != '') $title #end Pantry Order Assigned to you

velocity_template.body:
Dear #if($recipientName != '') $recipientName, #else User(s), #end

Your asset order has been cancelled with the following notes:

#if($userMessage != '') $userMessage #end

If you did not request this action, please contact markops-production@google.com for assistance.

Have a good day!

This email is an automated notification, which is unable to receive replies.
We are happy to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please contact us
directly 24/7 via customerservice@tenovos.io
velocity_template.subject: Order #: #if($title && $title != '') $title #end Pantry Order Cancelled

velocity_template.body:
Dear #if($recipientName != '') $recipientName, #else User(s), #end

Your asset order has been approved by the Pantry team for the terms of use that you requested. Please be sure to check rights again with us if your intended use changes in any way.

Click here to download your assets.

Have a good day!

This email is an automated notification, which is unable to receive replies.
We are happy to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please contact us
directly 24/7 via customerservice@tenovos.io
velocity_template.subject: Order #: #if($title && $title != '') $title #end Pantry Order Approved

assetTransformationShare.body:
Dear User(s),

$sender.name has shared asset transformation(s) with you. #if($velocityTemplate.data.message && $velocityTemplate.data.message !="")

$sender.name says:
$velocityTemplate.data.message
#end
#if($velocityTemplate.data.presignedURL && !$velocityTemplate.data.presignedURL.empty) Click here to view #end

Have a good day!
Pantry Team

This email is an automated notification, which is unable to receive replies.
We are happy to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please contact us
directly 24/7 via markops-production@google.com
assetTransformationShare.subject: Asset Transformations Shared With You

assetShare.body:
Dear #if($recipients.length == 1 && !$recipients[0].name.empty) $recipients[0].name, #else User(s), #end

$sender.name shared asset(s) with you in Pantry. #if($velocityTemplate.data.note != '')
Message from $sender.name:
$velocityTemplate.data.note
#end
Click here to view

Have a good day!
Pantry Team

This email is an automated notification, which is unable to receive replies.
We are happy to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please contact us
directly 24/7 via markops-production@google.com
assetShare.subject: Pantry Assets Shared with you

assetExpiryEmail.body:
Dear User(s),

#if($velocityTemplate.data.presignedURL && !$velocityTemplate.data.presignedURL.empty)Looks like you downloaded and possibly used this asset.
Click here to view

The rights for Google to use this asset will expire in $velocityTemplate.data.expirationDays days and it will need to be removed wherever it is in use externally. If you would like to extend the rights please use the asset link above and proceed with a Download Request in Pantry to initiate the process.#end

#if($velocityTemplate.data.message && !$velocityTemplate.data.message.empty) $velocityTemplate.data.message

#end Have a good day!
Pantry Team

This email is an automated notification, which is unable to receive replies.
We are happy to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please contact us
directly 24/7 via customerservice@tenovos.io
assetExpiryEmail.subject: Asset Expiration Report - $velocityTemplate.data.expirationDays days - #if($velocityTemplate.data.currentDate && ! $velocityTemplate.data.currentDate.empty)($velocityTemplate.data.currentDate) #end
